Package com.stormpath.sdk.idsite

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AccountResult
    Represents the result of an ID Site callback redirect, obtained after the end-user has used the ID Site and has been returned to an application's callbackUri.
    AuthenticationResult
    Holder for Authentication-specific data that will be received on the IdSiteResultListener#onAuthenticated(AuthenticationResult) method.
    IdSiteCallbackHandler
    Handles HTTP replies sent from your ID Site to your application's callbackUri, for example, https://awesomeapp.com/id, and returns an AccountResult.
    IdSiteResultListener
    Listener interface to get notifications about effective operations of the Id Site invocation: registration, authentication or logout.
    IdSiteUrlBuilder
    Helps build a URL you can use to redirect your application users to a hosted login/registration/forgot-password site - what Stormpath calls an 'Identity Site' (or 'ID Site' for short) - for performing common user identity functionality.
    LogoutResult
    Holder for Logout-specific data that will be received on the IdSiteResultListener#onLogout(LogoutResult) method.
    Nonce
    A cryptographic nonce representation for values that cannot be used more than once.
    NonceStore
    Store nonce values and provides methods to check if a nonce has already been used, and to add it to the nonceStore to ensure that the same nonce cannot be used again.
    RegistrationResult
    Holder for Registration-specific data that will be received on the IdSiteResultListener#onRegistered(RegistrationResult) method.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    IdSiteResultStatus
    Enumeration identifying the possible results of an Id Site invocation.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    IDSiteException
    An abstract checked exception denoting an error in IDSite.
    IDSiteRuntimeException
    A sub-class of ResourceException representing an IDSite error.
    IDSiteSessionTimeoutException
    A sub-class of IDSiteException representing a specific IDSite error.
    InvalidIDSiteTokenException
    A sub-class of IDSiteException representing a specific IDSite error.
